vulnerability_description: Cisco Smart Install endpoints were discovered. Exposure of SMI to untrusted networks could allow complete compromise of the switch
vulnerability_remediation: If  devices in network that continue to have the Smart Install feature enabled, it is  strongly recommends to disable the Smart Install feature with the no vstack configuration command.
impact: allowing an unauthenticated, remote attacker to change the startup-config file and force a reload of the device, load a new IOS image on the device, and execute high-privilege CLI commands on switches running Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software.
